title: How to Swear Like a Pro
description: Swearing is an art form that many of us call upon when situations arise that are so beyond ordinary that our reach for words leave us digging at the bottom of the vocabulary barrel. For most occasions, a simple curse word will fulfill your requirement, but sometimes you just need an edge.Learn how to become creative with your swearing. From the compound swear to mood inclusions and the dreaded duplicate swears, this guide will help you become the envy of anybody that has ever uttered a curse word. This book contains swearing. Lots of $%#ing swearing.
author: Nick   James
